FwkSenCnt.MEANING: sb who is powerful in the business world

ExCnt.EX: He predicted that major groups such as Germany's Bertelsmann and interests controlled by magnates such as Silvio Berlusconi and Carlo de Benedetti would bid for television franchises .

I have no doubt that the shipping magnates and bankers of Hong Kong will continue to prosper .
The much-troubled New York property magnate , has a new problem , his lawyer said yesterday -- a steamy book written by his ex-wife .
Newspaper magnate William Randolph Hearst stuffed the complex with furniture , paintings and works of art from around the world ; the effect is an overwhelming jumble of artifacts .
